item.title: IBM软件业务增长推动营收超预期
item.description: 国际商业机器公司公布的季度销售额超出分析师预期，其备受关注的软件部门实现了强劲增长。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. reported quarterly sales that topped analysts’ estimates on strong growth for its closely watched software unit.】

item.title: Meta表示2026年支出将远超分析师预期
item.description: Meta Platforms公司表示，其在数据中心和人工智能领域的投入将远超分析师预期，这使得该公司面临更大压力，必须证明这些投资能够带来回报。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. said it will spend far more than analysts expected on data centers and more for artificial intelligence, increasing pressure on the business to show a return on that investment.】

item.title: 澳大利亚债券销售额飙升至历史新高，投资者避开美元
item.description: 澳大利亚信贷市场正成为寻求美元投资替代方案的投资者的首选目的地，推动当地债券交易量创下历史新高。【原文：Australia’s credit market is becoming a favored destination for investors seeking alternatives to dollar investments, driving local bond deals to a record.】

item.title: 特朗普动用国民警卫队每月耗资9300万美元
item.description: 根据国会预算办公室最新核算，2025年美国总统唐纳德·特朗普向各城市部署国民警卫队的行动至少耗费纳税人4.96亿美元——且支出正以每月9300万美元的速度持续攀升。【原文：President Donald Trump’s deployment of National Guard troops to US cities cost taxpayers at least $496 million in 2025 — with the price tag rising to a rate of $93 million a month, according to a new accounting from the Congressional Budget Office.】

item.title: 做空机构瞄准Carvana，股价应声暴跌
item.description: Carvana公司股价创九个月来最大跌幅，此前有做空机构指控这家在线汽车零售商通过与首席执行官Ernie Garcia III家族控制的企业建立密切关系，虚报了收益。【原文：Carvana Co.’s shares fell the most in more than nine months after a short seller alleged the online auto retailer overstated earnings with the help of close ties to businesses controlled by the family of Chief Executive Officer Ernie Garcia III.】

item.title: 金融科技公司Alkami聘请顾问探讨出售事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，金融科技公司Alkami Technology Inc.正面临激进投资者的压力，目前正探索包括潜在出售在内的多种选择。【原文：Alkami Technology Inc., the financial-technology company that’s come under pressure from an activist investor, is exploring options including a potential sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 首家品牌贷款方考虑撤资克利夫兰之行后
item.description: 当曼哈顿的重组顾问公司正从解构第一品牌公司残局中核算费用时，部分债权人已忍无可忍。他们不愿再向这家破产企业注入资金，遂要求获取大量新信息，并飞赴克利夫兰办公室实地考察尚有价值的资产。【原文：As restructuring advisory firms in Manhattan tallied their fees from untangling the First Brands wreckage, some of its creditors decided they’d seen enough. Wary of sinking more cash into the bankrupt firm, they sought reams of new information and flew to its Cleveland offices to see for themselves what was worth salvaging.】

item.title: 特斯拉第四季度财报分析
item.description: 加利福尼亚州科尔马市的一家特斯拉门店。摄影师：David Paul Morris/彭博社【原文：A Tesla store in Colma, California. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 据称恩特拉塔正与高盛、摩根大通合作推进首次公开募股
item.description: 知情人士透露，房地产软件公司Entrata正与高盛集团和摩根大通合作筹备首次公开募股。【原文：Entrata, a property software company, is working with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. on an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 环球音乐收购超级粉丝应用股权以促进艺人互动
item.description:
全球最大的唱片公司正寻求建立粉丝忠诚度并从中获取更多收益的途径。【原文：

The world’s largest record label is looking for ways to build loyalty and make more money from fans

】

item.title: 泽西迈克正与摩根士丹利、摩根大通合作推进首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，拥有逾3000家门店的三明治连锁品牌Jersey Mike’s Subs正与摩根士丹利及摩根大通合作筹备首次公开募股。【原文：Jersey Mike’s Subs, the sandwich chain with more than 3,000 locations, is working with Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase & Co. on an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 软件公司债券下跌，投资者对人工智能的担忧加剧
item.description: 投资者正对服务于从汽车到金融等行业的软件公司债券失去兴趣，因为快速发展的人工智能创新正威胁颠覆这些公司的商业模式。【原文：Investors are souring on the bonds of software companies that service industries ranging from automotive to finance as fast-paced artificial intelligence innovations threaten to upend their business models.】

item.title: 美国商务部计划在旧金山设立国家人工智能中心
item.description: 美国商务部正筹备在旧金山开设国家人工智能中心，此举将使该机构更贴近那些处于政府多项高调计划核心的企业。【原文：The US Department of Commerce is preparing to open a national artificial-intelligence center in San Francisco, putting it closer to firms at the center of some of the government’s most high-profile initiatives.】

item.title: 墨西哥正迎来燃料制造的复兴。这对美国炼油厂而言是个坏消息。
item.description: 墨西哥燃料生产十年来的强劲复苏，可能拖累美国炼油厂的业绩，因为其最大燃料买家的需求正在减弱，这加剧了人们对美国汽油库存积压的担忧。【原文：A decade-high resurgence in Mexican fuelmaking threatens to weigh on US refineries as demand from their largest fuel buyer fades, adding to worries about buildup of gasoline stockpiles in America.】

item.title: 美联储维持利率不变，认可失业率趋稳态势
item.description: 美联储官员维持利率不变，同时指出美国经济有所改善，并暗示对未来潜在调整将采取更谨慎的态度。【原文：Federal Reserve officials left interest rates unchanged and pointed to improvements in the US economy as they signaled a more cautious approach to potential future adjustments.】

item.title: 美联储维持利率不变的决定要点
item.description: 以下是美联储周三利率决议的关键要点：【原文：Here are key takeaways from the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision on Wednesday:】

item.title: 通用汽车财报超预期后获多家机构上调目标价
item.description: 通用汽车公司第四季度的亮眼业绩促使十多位华尔街分析师上调了对这家汽车制造商的目标股价，向投资者发出信号：该股的强劲涨势远未结束。【原文：General Motors Co.’s blockbuster fourth-quarter results prompted more than a dozen Wall Street analysts to boost their price targets on the carmaker, sending a signal to investors that the furious rally in the stock is far from over.】

item.title: 巴西将以美元、欧元、人民币三种货币在国际债务市场融资
item.description: 巴西国家财政部周三发布的一项计划显示，该国将在2026年更频繁地通过发行人民币计价债券开拓国际市场。【原文：Brazil will tap international markets more often in 2026 with bond issuances denominated in Chinese renminbi, its national treasury said in a plan released Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普的宾州车站改造计划将与各州展开资金争夺战
item.description: 美国国家铁路客运公司（Amtrak）——特朗普政府指定负责翻新曼哈顿宾夕法尼亚车站的机构——将要求新泽西州和纽约州共同出资，对北美最繁忙的火车站进行改造。【原文：Amtrak, which the Trump administration put in charge of overhauling Manhattan’s Penn Station, will ask New Jersey and New York to help finance the renovation of North America’s busiest train depot.】

item.title: 杠杆企业借势投资者对美国高风险贷款的需求
item.description: 企业借款人正抓住美国杠杆贷款市场强劲的投资者需求，扩大交易规模并锁定更便宜的融资。【原文：Corporate borrowers are seizing on strong investor demand in the US leveraged loan market, upsizing deals and locking in cheaper financing.】

item.title: 美国国土安全部尝试新论点迫使Meta提供用户数据
item.description: 该机构最终撤回了其要求。【原文：The agency ultimately withdrew its demand.】

item.title: 算法基金经理在天然气价格历史性飙升中蒙受损失
item.description: 过去一周美国天然气期货市场出现的史无前例的剧烈波动，令部分采用算法驱动交易策略的资金管理人措手不及。【原文：The historic volatility witnessed in US natural gas futures over the past week caught out some money managers who use algorithmically driven trading strategies.】

item.title: Stellantis削减菲亚特、标致在法国售价以争夺销量
item.description: Stellantis NV正大幅下调其菲亚特、欧宝和标致品牌在法国的汽车售价，以期在该制造商对其全球业务进行深度审查之际重夺市场份额。【原文：Stellantis NV is slashing prices for its Fiat, Opel and Peugeot cars in France in a bid to regain market share at a time when the manufacturer is conducting a deep review of its global operations.】

item.title: 德意志银行拟收购保险公司股权重返寿险市场
item.description: 知情人士透露，德意志银行及其资产管理公司德意志资产管理集团正考虑收购复星国际控股的人寿保险整合公司的大量少数股权，这可能标志着这家德国银行重返该市场。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG and its asset manager DWS Group are considering taking a significant minority stake in a Fosun International Ltd.-controlled life insurance consolidator, people familiar with the matter said, potentially marking the German lender’s return to the market.】

item.title: 美元波动终于开始在国债市场引发涟漪
item.description: 美元汇率的剧烈波动正开始渗透至美国国债市场，这预示着美元疲软可能推高利率。【原文：Sharp swings in the dollar are starting to seep into the Treasury bond market, a warning sign that a weak greenback has the potential to push interest rates higher.】

item.title: 长期市政债券因收益率上升而需求回升
item.description: 尽管今年市政债券价格持续攀升，但资金管理人士指出，长期美国州及地方债务——这类常被投资者回避的债券——仍具吸引力。【原文：While municipal bonds have gotten increasingly expensive this year, money managers say that long-dated US state and local debt — often eschewed by investors — still look appealing.】

item.title: 尼尔·杜塔论通胀鹰派为何可能失策
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的贡献。无论内容如何，我们保证始终精彩纷呈。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔债券发行成功提振阿根廷全球债务重组希望
item.description: 厄瓜多尔重返全球信贷市场的轰动性回归，被投资者视为一个好兆头。这些投资者正热切期待阿根廷能从多年被国际融资拒之门外的困境中卷土重来。【原文：Ecuador’s splashy return to global credit markets is being seen as a good portent among investors who are eagerly awaiting Argentina’s own comeback from years of being cut off from international financing.】

item.title: 人工智能客服初创企业Decagon估值达45亿美元
item.description: 客户支持初创企业Decagon AI公司最新一轮融资额达2.5亿美元，公司估值翻三倍至45亿美元，这再次印证了投资者对人工智能服务的热切需求。【原文：Decagon AI Inc., a customer support startup, has raised $250 million in a new round of funding that triples its valuation to $4.5 billion, the latest sign of feverish investor demand for artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: 谷歌称人工智能助手现可代用户浏览网页
item.description: 谷歌将在其Chrome浏览器上推出一款人工智能助手，该助手能够代用户打开网站并进行点击操作。【原文：Google is launching an artificial intelligence assistant on its Chrome browser that can open websites and click around on a user’s behalf.】
